TEXT.English: Waldrun has taught his Adepts and Disciples the cruel art of trapping souls and dragging them back to Erebus to serve as Sluaghs. if you focus on teaching your adepts shadow and undeath and upgrading your arcane line you will grow more and more powerful!

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 1: Your Adepts and Disciples gain the chance to summon [LINK=UNIT_SLUAGH]Sluaghs[\LINK] on killing a living unit. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 2: Your mages gain a [LINK=SPELL_SUMMON_SLUAGH]new spell[\LINK] when they have Shadow II and Undeath II. Elementals gain death and shadow affinity. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 3: Your Archmages gain the ability to become a [LINK=SPELL_WILLING_VESSEL]willing vessel[\LINK] for one of Laroth's Dullahan at level 10.
